description:
This step-by-step course will teach you how to setup, run and use Wordpress. When you are finished with this course you will know how to use WordPress and move on in the direction you want. For example, building a business website, blog or even eCommerce store.

In this very to the point course you will learn everything you need to master WordPress. In just over a hour of content you will know how to create pages, posts and install themes or even plugins. This will help you in your WordPress journey.

This course will be updated regularly with the newest WordPress updates or even new lectures. For now this course will answers all you basic question about WordPress. In the f

But there is more. If you want, I create a lecture specially for you! Yes, that is right, you can send me a message and I will record as many lectures needed to help you. That request can be for a specific theme, plugin or function in WordPress.

There are so many plugins and extension available for WordPress it is very difficult for me to please all of you right from the start. So do not hesitate to contact me, i will make sure I deliver and i will deliver within a week.

Have fun with my course, if you have any questions, suggestions or feedback please do not hesitate to contact me though Udemy or directly.
title: WordPress Basics: Learn WordPress in one hour!
